name: select_contact
description: Select a contact from the list to start a new conversation.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to select?'}

name: create_group
description: Create a new group of contacts.

name: input_recipient
description: Input a recipient's name, phone number, or email address manually.
parameters: {'recipient_info': "What is the recipient's name, phone number, or email address?"}

name: switch_to_dialpad
description: Switch between entering text and numbers for input.

name: navigate_back
description: Navigate back to the previous screen or menu.
